Episodes.Title: Chapter 53
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Frank Pugliese
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: As congress debates investigating Frank, he and Claire attempt to stoke fear of terrorism. Tom Yates continues his stay in the White House.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 54
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Melissa James Gibson
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank and his team work to leverage support in key states by any means necessary. Claire learns some upsetting news about one of Frank's friends.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 55
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The day before the election, Conway holds a 24-hour Skype session with voters, while Frank and Claire stump in key States and try to discredit him.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 56
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: With a tight race and low voter turnout on Election Day, things look grim for Frank. But he's got one more trick up his sleeve.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 57
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Nine weeks after Election Day, the Underwoods work to consolidate their power. Leann tries to track down a missing Aidan Macallan.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 58
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: In the midst of uncertainty, suspected Russian forces take over an American station in Antarctica. Meanwhile, a damaging news leak could hurt Frank.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 59
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: When a crisis forces White House personnel to take shelter in a bunker, Commerce Department official Jane Davis negotiates through back channels.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 60
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: While Frank attends an elite men's weekend gathering to firm up support, Claire deals with a stranded Russian ship and threats from Petrov.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 61
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Petrov tries to influence affairs in the U.S. Jane discusses her agenda with Claire. With her job at stake, Leann reaches out to a reporter for help.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 62
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: The Underwoods and their team angle to undermine the revived committee investigating Frank. Hammerschmidt's investigation heats up.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 63
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: As the team tries to control the fallout from damaging testimony and leaks, everyone is under suspicion and tensions flare between Frank and Claire.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 64
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: Frank attempts to stop Cathy from testifying. With Hammerschmidt sniffing out the truth, the Underwoods throw someone close to them under the bus.

Episodes.Title: Chapter 65
Episodes.Writer: Michael Dobbs, Andrew Davies, Beau Willimon
Episodes.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
Episodes.Plot: In the wake of a surprising announcement, everything at the White House is shaken up. A decision must be made about whether to go to war.
